title: Drawing, "Burning of the Borgo, after Raphael", late 18th century
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman carrying water.  Inspired after figure in "Burning of the Borgo" by Raphael. Figure at extreme right in Raphael's painting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Burning of the Borgo, after Raphael", late 18th century.
late 18th century. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3164.
